A

abs(Object) - Static method in class com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement.Function
The SQLite ABS function returns the absolute value of the numeric argument.
Alias - Class in com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement
This class used to producing an ALIAS clause which temporary renaming the object(could be table||column||function) as a given name in a particular SQL statement.
Alias(Object, CharSequence) - Constructor for class com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement.Alias
Constructing the ALIAS clause.
and(Object) - Method in class com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement.Statement
Appending the AND clause.
append(Object) - Method in class com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement.Statement
A safe way to appending a value if instance of String, include quoting the String value.

A safe way to appending a value if instance of String, include quoting the String value.
appendClauses(Object...) - Method in class com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement.Statement
Concatenates all the given clauses, separating them with commas.
asc() - Method in class com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement.Statement
Appending the ASCENDING order clause.
avg(Object) - Static method in class com.vincestyling.asqliteplus.statement.Function
The SQLite AVG function selects the average value for certain table column.
